summary: 17 CFR § 239.11 specifies that Form S-1 is used for registering securities under the Securities Act of 1933 for registrants without an authorized alternative form, excluding foreign governments, their political subdivisions, and asset-backed securities. This regulation was updated on September 24, 2014.
